name: THE KING OF HELL RECLAINING THE THRONE
name_original: THE KING OF HELL RECLAINING THE THRONE
description:
You were initially the King of Hell 

but you were invaded by an army of evil duck spirits

 and you was casted out!

Fight your way back to reach your throne 

reclaim your rightful title as the King of hell!

                                           HOW TO PLAY :

                                          You move with A and D  You Jump with SPACE 

                                         You shoot with mouse left pointer or Mouse 0

                                     HOW TO WIN:

                                     Get a score of 1300.

                                 

                        CREDITS:

                 MUSIC FROM:https://opengameart.org/content/platformer-music
